name: Timestone
description: A Web Application that sync the APU time table to your calendar

APP_KEY.description: Please change this to a 32-character string. For example run `echo -n 'base64:'; openssl rand -base64 32` and copy/paste the value.

APP_URL.description: Please change this to your Heroku app's domain.

APP_ENV.description: Use timestone in 'production' mode, or set it to 'local' if you want to install timestone as a development version.

DB_CONNECTION.description: Tells the application to use Heroku's database connection.

HEROKU.description: Tells the application this application is hosted on Heroku.
